- The space to the right (row = 8, col = 7) is also an empty floor '.'.

- Downwards (row = 9, col = 6) is wall 'g', which is an immovable obstacle.

Since we want to take a meaningful action and our last position didn't change, I will first try to move left in order to open up more options on the board.

``` Action: 1 ```

Moving left into an empty space may provide additional strategic freedom for the next steps. My expectation is that this action will position the avatar effectively to explore further or interact with a nearby entity in subsequent moves.
